title: Dead rodents found on Gene Hackman’s property by health department investigators
content: Hackman's wife died from hantavirus, a rare disease caused by exposure to rodents, before her husband died, according to a medical examiner's report.

title: Call of Duty 2025: Wenn dieses Feature zurückkommt, kaufe ich den Shooter zum Release

title: JD Vance trolled with jokes that Trump’s tariffs ‘will lead to the soaring price of eyeliner’
content: Vice-president JD Vance has once again become the butt of jokes over his alleged use of eyeliner, and this time its related to the thorny issue of Trump’s controversial tariffs. Now, we don’t take issue with anyone for their apparent use of make up, but if yo…

title: Mr. Drew and His Animals, Too searching for new location. Again.
content: Drew Desjardins, owner of the business, announced Monday that he has been told that he needs to leave his spacious spot at the Lewiston Mall by the end of July.

title: Integration Tests for Plugin Developers: GitHub Actions and Setting Up Continuous Integration
content: In our previous blog posts, we created integration tests that interact with UI components, assert different properties of UI components, and interact with APIs. Now, it’s time to look at how to set up continuous integration to ensure that we don’t break them …

title: ‘The Race’ rapper Tay-K convicted of murder for the second time
content: The rapper is best known for his hit track "The Race," which has amassed hundreds of millions of streams since its release in 2017.
